comments:
N20050607

(not connected to bug 983279)

- no auto-refresh
- open Test.java in a Java editor (do not dirty)
- externally delete Test.java
- return to eclipse
-> Msg: file has been deleted -
- choose to save
- Accept defaults
-> Warning: Overwrite File? 
- press Cancel
-> Again: Msg: file has been deleted 
- choose to save
- Again: Accept defaults
-> Again: Warning: Overwrite File?
- This time press 'Ok'

-> get this in the log (everything works, but I should not get the log).
